website_summaries.verdict: A simple but solid Spider-Man action figure with or without the power pack.
pros: Spider-Man figure includes a space for Titan Hero Power Pack which makes the character talk
12" figure can stand on its own
Brightly colored and sits at a shockingly low price point
cons: Titan Hero Power Pack is sold separately
Power port makes one arm much bigger

customer_reviews.title: Product received is not what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product I received is not what was advertised. The Spiderman I received has some attachment port on his left arm for some sort of cannon. I guess it would not have been as big of an issue if the cannon came with this Spiderman but it did not. This item was purchased as a display piece for my son's nursery and I will not display this horrible item. I would not be upset if I received what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary schwartz

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift and this weekend when the gift was opened, we noticed immediately that something was missing. I should have read the other reviews. The figure does not look like the item in the photos and is completely misleading. My son was very excited to get his Spider-Man but was asking for the other piece which didn’t come with it. I’d like to return it but at this point my little boy doesn’t want to part with his favorite super hero. Please be warned and do not buy this toy from this seller. It’s not what you’re expecting!
customer_reviews.author: Humberto S

customer_reviews.title: Its not the only purchase you have to make. Attachments sold separately.
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice to have first pictures shown to be the back of the toy. Because i wouldnt have purchased 2 of them, only to find out you havr to buy a seperate attachment. Becaude if you dont buy an attachment, the toy has a square section on the back of it.
customer_reviews.author: TEJ

customer_reviews.title: Not what's advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these KNOWING that it was part of the FX Port set and that there would be a boxy imprint where the chip goes in. What I didn't expect was a big chunky arm with a hole in it that completely disfigures the figurine. If this is the "updated version" the seller needs to also update their product photo as this is false advertisement. Unfortunately this was purchased for a child's birthday gift (the other one for my son) and I don't have time to return and order another gift. Be aware that any 2019 purchases will not arrive as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Nery

customer_reviews.title: Pictures of product are misleading
customer_reviews.text: The pictures were misleading. I thought this was just a classic Spider-Man doll and the pictures show that it is, but when it came in the mail, it has a hole on the back for some kind of attachment and a built-in attachment with another hole on the arm. My kid keeps asking over and over what these are for and apparently you can buy some kind of attachments to stick in here, but I cannot even find these online. Anyway, my main problem with this is that the pictures do not show these features. Otherwise my child loves this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Sarich

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish I knew what the square in his back was for. But aweosme product none the less.
customer_reviews.author: J. Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Good
customer_reviews.text: On its own, this is a simple Spiderman figure, and the boys (ages 2 and 5) love it. The design looks great, the weight feels good, Spidey stands easily. His legs can both move forward at a 90 degree angle, but can't move backward, and he can do the full splits with his legs to the sides. His shoulder, wrist, and neck joints can rotate 360 degrees, and his head can be posed to look slightly downward. Excellent toy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful my 3 year son loved yo hold all the time..
customer_reviews.author: SIDRA

customer_reviews.title: not a true action figure
customer_reviews.text: The colors are bright, and it looks like Spiderman. However, only the head, shoulders, hips, and wrists articulate even a little. The knees and elbows do not. I'm not sure this is a true action figure. Also he came scuffed up while still being in the package, his eyeball is scuffed and I can't fix it.
customer_reviews.author: wil post

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this Spider-Man. I gave it an overall 4/5 rather than 5/5 only because it’s not the exact product that is listed. Like many of the reviewers have said/posted photos about, it has places on its arm and back for some sort of add-on or something but it doesn’t compromise the quality of the product. When I purchased it I was well aware of the possibility that I would receive this alternate product after I read the reviews. I would change my review to 5/5 if the product description/photos were changed to depict exactly what you’d receive.
customer_reviews.author: Cayla

customer_reviews.title: MISLEADING!
customer_reviews.text: Agree with all other buyers. This toy is completely misleading as you don’t get the launcher. Nowhere does it say you need to purchase this part separately. Spider-Man looks odd because he has a huge square hole in his back and arm. Luckily my son is 4 and doesn’t seem to mind because he loves Spider-Man so much, but still it’s disappointing and buyers are being duped!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Johns

customer_reviews.title: Excellent SiZe!
customer_reviews.text: Bought quickly based on good price without realizing that I was getting a nice sized action hero. Because I purchased several action heroes to decorate my "adult" son's game room, I did not want cheap looking dollar store figures - this one looks great and because it's actually bigger than I had planned, it will add to original plan. He will be on display so his back is not an issue we will be obsessing with but great to know there is an additional feature that can be used if ever wanted. Very good deal here.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Edelman

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces, not authentic?
customer_reviews.text: This was weird, he has a bracket on his arm and leg not pictured for some prices that it didn’t come with. My three year old didn’t care but it annoyed me. I was at target last week and they have this same guy with the cutouts and it includes a shooter and something else which explains the oddity. That one was priced at almost $20 so I’m fine receiving this for $8. But it seems like maybe they used returns or something to package these which are why they come without the same xtra pieces?
customer_reviews.author: Jason Natalie

customer_reviews.title: You don’t get what’s pictured! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered one thing and received another. This figure comes with a left arm which is bulky and it supposed to have an added feature of a power FX launcher...which did not come in the package. It says it is compatible for the power FX. Which is fantastic if you could order one, or if that’s what we ordered. Neither is the case. My son (six years old) likes it, but wants it “fixed.“
customer_reviews.author: K. Carmack

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: Same issue as others- I wish I read the reviewers before purchasing!! I didn’t get what is displayed. Instead it’s a figure with open ports and you have to buy attachments which turned into a HUGE fiasco when my son opened this. He was so upset about the holes in Spider-Man it was a disaster. It looks like the port issue is now buried in the details section - not helpful. You should get the item that is pictured and not something different!
customer_reviews.author: READER10

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for any Spiderman fan!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this Spiderman action figure! It's alot bigger than I expected wich is good. I'm not sure what the hole on his back is for but it's no biggie. His arms and legs move so you can put him in different poses. It's a great toy for any Spiderman fan!
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Action figure does not match the photo
customer_reviews.text: The action figure that I got does not match the picture of the listing. The description states “titan hero series” which I was unaware that this series has a Square opening in the left arm and back of the figure for a shooter attachment which is l, of course, sold separately. The figure I thought I was buying based on the photo does not have any attachments and is misleading. If you want the regular action figurine, be sure not to get the “titan hero series”
customer_reviews.author: southernbelle722

customer_reviews.title: What what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a well made product. But will be returning in the next week if I can't find the launch that's sold separately for it. Looks nothing like the picture it has a bulcky arm where the add on suppose to go that you cant remove
customer_reviews.author: alb

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toy overall
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy overall. The price was great as well. The knees and elbows do not bend but the arms and legs do rotate and move very easily. This does have a weird shaped slot on the back that I couldn’t figure out what it was for. The plastic is durable. My son loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened to reviews/False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the reviews that the item sent is not as advertised. Image of item on advertisement clearly shows a plain spiderman with no special gadget attachments to it. Which would be fine if accessories could be sold separately. Didn't even bother opening the box, I don't need to be giving a gift that will have them asking me for the gadgets and I'd have to tell them that they're not anywhere to be sold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this spider-man. However, I don’t. Apparently there are accessories for it. So my son has been asking for them. The problem with that is, I can’t seem to be able to buy the accessories anywhere. The only way that I am able to get the accessories is if I buy the spider-man that comes with it. Now if I would have known that exsisted, I would have just bought that one instead for a couple dollars more.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya Spencer

customer_reviews.title: " like the webs are coming out of his hand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1.5yo, which may seem strange but he loves Spiderman. He has not put the toy down and keeps holding out his arm, running around and saying "pshew pshew!" like the webs are coming out of his hand.
customer_reviews.author: Tassy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter. She loves it, plays with it, and takes it everywhere we go! Very durable. It can withstand very harsh toddler play conditions. It is important to note (as it does in the description) that it has what they call a Fx Port. This is a spot on the back of the item and the arm of the item to connect accessories. They can be purchased separately. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresented and scratched
customer_reviews.text: Product was scratched as if used. Also, don't be deceived by the pictures. It does NOT come with the attachment, BUT it does come with large holes in the action figure for the attachment. Also the large arm of the Spider-Man is permanent and is not something that clips on. My son was confused by this when he opened it on his birthday. That was maddening. He was excited about it, then it was opened and it was a disappointment. Thinking about returning this product. It was misrepresented, cheaply made, and scratched.
customer_reviews.author: C & J

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and the arms n legs are retractable. The only disappointment was the missing launcher/gun which we initially thought was missing with our order but i came here to read from other reviews that they ts a separate purchase. My son doesnt care much for that at this point cos he was eagerly waiting for this figurine.
customer_reviews.author: Sid26

customer_reviews.title: Didn't match the picture
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this based on one that our nephew has, but the one I received has some big square mount on the arm. This is not what the picture showed and not what we expected. I didn't see this until we had given it to our 3 year old grandson... no taking it back after that. He's an avid Spider Man fan, but he doesn't play with this toy like we expected and I'm sure it's because the arm looks too clunky. Quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John Hoaby

customer_reviews.title: Good depiction of spider man but seems to be a little cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This is your typical action figure of the larger sort. I had thought it would feel a little higher quality like the smaller ones, but it doesn't. I am relatively pleased for the price, but after I bought it, I did see it at Walmart for the same price. Usually the Amazon price is cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: ~V

customer_reviews.title: Where is the attachment???????
customer_reviews.text: Where is the attachment? The toy is not complete and not as advertised. At the beginning I thought my kids lost it before even i saw it but then my partner, who opened the box confirmed there were no attachment. Was not able to find any extra element for it to buy separately. Would be a very happy client if pridermen hands would be same with no attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: This spider-man has a HUGE hole on the side of the arm with nothing to attach. At first I thought I would go and order the attachment (even though what I received DOES NOT match what is shown). Sending this back on the principle of being shown one item and receiving another one
customer_reviews.author: Premier of Burlington

customer_reviews.title: False advertising, need an accurate photo
customer_reviews.text: Same as these other comments. Not sure why I thought I would be a lucky one and get the action figure shown in the photo. We didn’t! And my son wants to know what that “plug” in his arm and back are for. For $8, we just wanted the dang doll! No “titan hero pack” version WITHOUT the titan hero. At the VERY least this seller could offer to sell the attachment separately.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Big rectangular hole on his back and arm!
customer_reviews.text: This Spider-Man is sold without the titan hero power pack. This wouldn’t be a problem except for the huge rectangular hole on his back and forearm. It is very clear that something is missing. The pictures in the description aren’t accurate and don’t show the holes. I just thought I was buying a standard Spider-Man. Also, you can’t just buy the power pack separately. Not really happy. My 4 year old son opened this on Christmas morning and asked what was wrong with his Spider-Man. If I had the original box, I would definitely try to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Katie L.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a lie
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. Wish I’d read the reviews, but the five stars is deceptive. It appears the figurine has been updated. It is not as pictured. It also seems as though I cannot buy the accessories without purchasing another figurine. What is the point to that? Also, I got a return. It’s all scuffed. Someone else got the figurine before me and probably felt cheated too.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Denbo

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured. This is a joke.
customer_reviews.text: This seller is a fraud. How are there two different styles of Spider-Man shown in the pictures? One doesn’t have the web shooter thing on his arm and the other does. I wanted just a normal Spider-Man and instead I got one that has some weird thing on his arm. Wtf?
customer_reviews.author: Risa

customer_reviews.title: Be warned: Can’t buy the missing FX Pack separately
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4yo son, and didn’t realize the Power FX pack (web launcher/sound components) didn’t come with it. It says it’s sold separately...but I contacted Hasbro and they don’t sell the FX pack independent of an action figure in the Titan Hero series...So I either have to buy another action figure with the “starter pack” or let my son be satisfied with a partial toy. How stupid is this?!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the picture
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t get what was pictured. There is a weird cutout on his arm and back. I feel like this listing misrepresented what was sold
customer_reviews.author: stopper

customer_reviews.title: Ours wasn’t quite as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Ours wasn’t as pictured. There’s a part on Spider-Man’s arm where it looks like another piece would be placed onto that wasn’t in the box. I didn’t notice until my fiancé helped our son unwrap & unbox it on Christmas morning. Our son is only 2 and he loves the action figure regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Action Figure
customer_reviews.text: My godson just got into Spider-Man. I got him this for his birthday, this is his first action figure and more attached he could not be. I am a comic enthusiast and heck I wanted to keep the action figure for myself! Great priced, great size, great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amart

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected.
customer_reviews.text: Just know when you buy this product you’re getting an action figure with holes in it for additionally purchased accessories. If you know that you’re fine. It’ll do for a child’s toy. But the package was ripped when I got it. And it seems like a cheaper plastic version of other Superhero action figures.. Of all the superhero toys I have purchased I am definitely the least pleased with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not like what is pictured!
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty disappointed with the toy I received. In some of the pictures both arms are regular, which made me think the whole shooter accessory was removable. The doll I received has one arm that is made to connect to connect to the shooter, which is sold separately! Also, the back has a big cutout to connect with some other accessory that was not included. Honestly I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone since it doesn’t include the extras it is made to connect with, so the arm just looks ugly and weird. Not what I was expecting from the pictures on this listing.
customer_reviews.author: Gertrude

customer_reviews.title: Why don't you sell the ports separately
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why you don't either include the port and charge a higher price or sell the ports separately. I understand that they are interchangeable but when you have more then one figure only one can talk. My 5 yr old grandson thought it was stupid and if a 5 yr old can figure that out then it must be stupid. That's why I gave it a low rating other then that the toy is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what is pictured/ not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Spider-Man that is pictured is not the one you get. I received a Spider-Man that looks like it has two notches for attachments, not the action figure pictured. To make it worse, the attachments aren’t included. So great. I can’t gift this. Someone else had this same complaint. Did they grab this one out of a defect box? Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good price! Purchased for my 4 yr olds Easter bakset. He loved it. My 2 year old loved it too. This is a large action figure, larger than a Barbie. Well made and seems durable. This would make a fabulous gift. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Haven't unboxed yet as it is a Christmas gift for my 2 year old. He LOVES Spiderman. It's a great size and quality, from what I can tell. Shipped fast. If I have any problems with it after unboxing I'll be sure to update.
customer_reviews.author: chrystian perez

customer_reviews.title: Our Son Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 3 year old as an early Christmas gift. He absolutely loves it! He takes it all over the house and everywhere we go as a family, as well as sleeps with it every night. It's durable and has been able to survive the intensity of an overactive 3 year old. I would recommend this toy/action figure to everyone with young kids.
customer_reviews.author: HeinzBarron

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't have bought this if I'd known it had a big pit on its back and a boxy disfigured arm. I bought this for my son specifically because the picture had a normal arm. This is false advertisement and I see a LOT of other people have had the same experience. DON'T buy this toy if you want a regular Spider-Man without the voice box hole on its back and big disfigured arm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t come with launcher. Cannot figure out how to buy attachments. So just has some odd holes/ports in the figure where the attachments should go. Disappointing. Have to read details carefully to know this in advance.
customer_reviews.author: Rashell🌻

customer_reviews.title: Misleading***Kicking myself for not checking the Reviews
customer_reviews.text: I did not think to check the reviews for a Spiderman toy....what could possibly go wrong with a Spiderman toy? Well, some brainiac decided to sell a toy with VISIBLE attachment ports with no attachments. Grandson is so confused. He loves Spiderman but wants to know where they are and if they are coming tomorrow....NO baby boy, they are not coming. I understand it was $9 Bucks but REALLY! Who does that....OK I messed up and did not read the small print about the attachments being sold separately....but to not even allow them to be purchased separately without spending $25-$30 is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like it since there are so few Spiderman toys around. It's sturdy but it's one arm is bulky and missing a gun/ pack. The picture cleverly doesn't show it. You can't even buy the pack seperated. Glad I was able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lilliana Colancecco

customer_reviews.title: Picture and item sent are different.
customer_reviews.text: The Spiderman received was not the doll on the image. The doll we got has empty space for FX parts. There are no FX attachments included. So now we have 2 dolls with missing parts. I would have like the Spiderman Doll shown. I bought 2 as gifts and could not take them back to return. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ptink

customer_reviews.title: All “not” included
customer_reviews.text: This Spider-Man is a great size and well made but I was unaware before purchase that the launcher was sold separately, guess I should have read the reviews. I’m not to worried about it right now because my son is only 2 and doesn’t even realize there are pieces missing from his “pierman” lol. But buyers be aware that there are two pieces sold separately before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and perfect for a 4 year old!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson. He loves Spiderman! It’s very durable which is mandatory since he plays with it all the time. Spider-Man flies through the air and into rocks and grass, climbs the patio pillars, and he even been thrown up on the patio roof. Very durable and withstands lots of rough play!
customer_reviews.author: Rainlore

customer_reviews.title: Kinda of misleading.
customer_reviews.text: Was a little disappointed that the pics show the jet pack attachment but it doesn’t come with Spider-man. Upon opening I thought he was missing something until I went back and re-read the description. The toy itself is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Decent one
customer_reviews.text: plastic is little faded and the shape has spaces given for extra parts which kind makes the toy look incomplete, DC figures come sin much better shape and quality. When we buy we expect a figure thats complete.
customer_reviews.author: Kalyanbojja

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this spider man but the plastic is kind of cheap feeling. I’m glad I got it as a prime deal otherwise, I would have felt ripped off. Not worth more than $8-$9. So far it has held up though and my son is happy so I’m still giving it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TOY- KNEES DO NOT HAVE FULL MOBILITY
customer_reviews.text: I DID NOT FULLY LOOK AT REVIEWS AS I WAS RUSHING TO PLACE MY ORDER BUT THIS TOY WAS BIGGER THAN EXPECTED WHICH WAS STILL FINE. KNEES ARE NOT FLEXIBLE BUT OVERALL THIS IS A NICE TOY FOR THE PRICE WITH DELIVERY! MY SON ENJOYS PLAYING WITH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: It looks like it comes with one of the attachment but doesn't.
customer_reviews.text: There is a square in his arm for an attachment which is sold separately. I have not been able find anyone that sells them. Same thing with a "Black Panther" one. They would be much more fun for the children they were bought for if we could find them somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E. Lehde

customer_reviews.title: NOT AT THE SAME TOY
customer_reviews.text: This is not the toy shown it has an open box on the arm and back ...WHAT GOES THERE? I didn't buy this I just wanted a regular Spiderman so disappointed 😒
customer_reviews.author: Tinesha Warren

customer_reviews.title: Completely different figure than the one pictured
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a surprise for my son. It looked good in the pictures but arrived with a giant contraption on its arm and back to attach accessories which are not included. Now it looks like I bought my son half a toy. I didn’t even think to read other reviews before ordering, because of the misleading photos. Instead of a fun surprise, it was a bit of a disappointment for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Wood

customer_reviews.title: Spidey!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I bought this little guy for my 2 year old because he loves "Spidey" and it's a Christmas gift so we haven't opened it yet but from what I can see, it's great for the price! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MommyTo2Boys

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Yes the price is great but I was expecting a smaller one to match captain America figure. My son is cool with it but it’s not bendable. Picture is not accurate. If I could get it away from him I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: lacey1

customer_reviews.title: It's not what you think it is. Dont buy the lie.
customer_reviews.text: I normally read reviews for items that are 3 stars or less to prepare myself for what could happen. This is not what we expected to receive. The missing attachment make it look incomplete and it looks very low quality. My son is old enough to know his toy is missing something. Very disappointed for his birthday. Dont buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Like so many others - was not expecting fx ports.
customer_reviews.text: Product pictures are completely misleading. Sounds have looked at the reviews first. Giant open boxes on arm and back. Thank goodness my boy accepted that we just didn't know why they were there.
customer_reviews.author: Madi R.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected!!
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected!! My son was so happy to open his spider man for easter and was disappointed no attachment to the Spider-Man so confused!! Should’ve read the comments since everyone clearly got the same thing as me :(
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna

customer_reviews.title: As described. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as described. Large and sturdy and has survived my 3 year olds rough play. It does have a weird square notch in the back that I'm not sure why it's there. I got it on a lightning deal so I got it at a great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Good but missing a piece?
customer_reviews.text: Cool toy. My son loves it. There’s a slot on the hand that looks like it’s supposed to come with an additional part. Like a toy web slinger or something but it didn’t come with that
customer_reviews.author: Joci McCann

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: This is not what is in the picture. The Spiderman has some sort of ports on the back and arm that do not have any attachment pieces. The pictures do not show this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jlee

customer_reviews.title: Product is not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: The spiderman we received has a cut out in his ARM not just his back. But we didn't realize it til after he tore open the box, so it isn't returnable. He cried, because it's not the one his friends have - and not the one that is on the picture here. A waste of $10. Would not have bought this if it had an accurate picture.
customer_reviews.author: SunshineNYC

customer_reviews.title: Not the toy in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: The product we received is not the one in the photo. The one we got has a big chunky arm with a hole for an accessory that is not included. My son earned this toy with chores and he was excited to get it then confused as to why spider-man’s arm looked weird. Obviously can’t return it because he still wants to keep the toy he earned.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this unless u have the mystery object that goes with this.
customer_reviews.text: So... now that I have been tricked into buying this piece of crap for my son.... where the heck do I buy the BS part that is supposed to go with it? Such a disappointment for my son.... thanks a lot. Definately NOT what it is advertised to be.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Arms and legs are fixed
customer_reviews.text: There aren't any knee, elbow, or wrist joints. The Batman from the same company and same price has all of those things. My son still likes it and plays with it.
customer_reviews.author: K Holland

customer_reviews.title: Missing attachment
customer_reviews.text: I saw the number of stars but did not read the reviews before purchasing. I am disappointed. The toy is missing the attachment, and the photo is misleading and doesn’t show this. My son still loves it but I wish the seller would have just said it did not come with the attachment, which cannot be bought separately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big spider man
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I thought but my son loves it .so glad it wasn't little .Very happy .just wish it came with the web shooter apparently you buy it separate or mine was missing but my kid loves it
customer_reviews.author: Billy  Rhoton

customer_reviews.title: Good size and durable.
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year-old is a new lover of Marvel superheroes so we are slowing collecting them. It's a good size and is holding up to the daily (rough) play of saving the day in his room.
customer_reviews.author: ECPone

customer_reviews.title: Little disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little disappointed in this Spiderman. The box was opened before and taped back together. The eyes were scratched and the paint was missing in spots. Looks like a return from someone else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Picked up for under $9. Apparently there are attachments, but the child was extremely satisfied with just the figurine. Most played with toy this holiday season and surely into the future.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Spiderman figure, no Web shooter
customer_reviews.text: They figure that my grandson received appeared to be able to use the Web shooter that was pictured on the box and the arm of the figure looked like it would accommodate it but it did not come with the figure and I can’t find any place to buy it separately.He was very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decently constructed, but lacks add on items
customer_reviews.text: Well made for the price however it has a slot in the back for some kind of voice box that is sold separately. Never really heard of a toy you have to buy a separate voice box for and it just struck me as a little weird. My son is only 3 however and it is not something he is really going to notice, but an older child may react differently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big and Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big. Great look, very nice colors, bib in grandsons hands and he absolutely LOVES it. He immediately put it in his book bag to take home.
customer_reviews.author: Con4him

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with web shooter, but has 2 holes where it should be.
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with attachment. There are two big holes where another toy is meant to attach to, the arm and in the back. It’s very obvious that something should have been included with this. Even my 4 yr old realized something was missing and as far as I can see, you cannot but the web shooter separately. Very disappointed and dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected , I bought this for a toy drive and it quite a large figure bigger than your hands and looked great. As a kid I would have wanted the same kind of figure too, and for the price it was not expensive at all
customer_reviews.author: Peanutbutterpandapuffs

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get this flawed toy
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the reviews that talked about the huge empty attachment holes in one arm and on the back, and nothing to go in them!! The pictures are deliberately misleading!! The angle of the pictures do not show these weird attachment places , of which I can’t find anything to buy that fits in them!😡 What a joke! Do not buy this !! My Grandson has already opened it before I knew the “flaw!” Wish I had returned this!!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: The action figure looked as expected but the Titan Hero Power Fx Port was not included as stated in several places in the description. I purchased 3 of the action figures thinking they would all work together, but none of them came with the Titan Hero Power Fx Port to make them interact. We were very disappointed. Now I cannot find it to buy it separately leaving my grandson with just the action figure.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his Spider-Man
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately when this guy arrived it didn’t come with the extra pieces it was supposed to. But my son loves his Spider-Man action figure & takes it literally everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The figure does not include a power port as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: The figure does not come with a power port as advertised! The advertisement is a lie! My grandson noticed something was missing immediately. We looked through the packaging to find the power port and it was missing. We THOUGHT it was a packaging mistake UNTIL we read the reviews of numerous consumers who discovered the same deliberate same thing. IT WAS NOT MISSING; IT WAS DELIBERATELY NOT INCLUDED!!!!! TOTALLY FALSE ADVERTISING!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Heater

customer_reviews.title: Cute great
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 yo loves it!!!!! Yes doesn’t come with webs and stuff, you can tell his arm is missing a special additional piece but for a little kid it makes no diff
customer_reviews.author: RRZR

customer_reviews.title: Product not as described, received updated version.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars because it is a good product at a good price, HOWEVER they sent the updated version with the port on the arm. It would have been ok but the product described is the old version. I bought another with the back port that included the power port to make them talk but now that is useless. After opening the box I saw that Spider-Man does have the back port.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Spider-Man Action Figure is a great value
customer_reviews.text: I loved this Spider-Man Action figure. I had bought a Batman for my grandson and he really liked it, so I went ahead and bought this one too. He loved it too. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Pkidd

customer_reviews.title: Spider-Man
customer_reviews.text: Spider-Man is the perfect size for my 6 year old grandson! I live out of state and shipped it to him for a birthday gift and he was so surprised when he opened it! A must have to add to his Marvel collection.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy, I had to pick up another 12 inch marvel character to I got the Hulk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: This is misleading, this Spider-Man toy comes with a left arm shaped for something that you have to buy separately and insert into this box like arm as well as another insert in the back that is not included. Did not expect that from the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Love Titan Hero Action Figures
customer_reviews.text: I love the Titan Hero Action Figures and this one is no exception. Great action figure most ages due the larger size and this one has no small pieces so even the younger kids can play with it. I love the detail on Spiderman.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: my grandson has one for one of his other super hero's and it goes on spiderman too
customer_reviews.text: I did not know that this spiderman has a interchangeable voice box, my grandson has one for one of his other super hero's and it goes on spiderman too. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.text: The pictures all show a clean, smooth, spider-man action figure. The one you receive has an oversized arm with a hole in it and another hole in its back. It does not resemble the pictures at all. I'll return the item and I'll be avoiding the seller completely.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves having boy characters so when daddy plays Barbies with her he has male superhero characters he can play. She picked this as a Christmas gift for her daddy. So far they both are happy with it :)
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Received another version!:(
customer_reviews.text: I received an entirely different version of what was advertised. Which sucks because now my kid wants the part that is missing with the toy, and it’s not sold separately!!
customer_reviews.author: Danaycee

customer_reviews.title: Kiddo loves this, when it's not pinching his fingers
customer_reviews.text: Just okay, build quality if good, but doesn't bend in the knees or arms, and kiddo can easily pinch his fingers in the leg joints. He's done it a few times, I've even done it once. Would suggest going with a different Figure.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy Kicks

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my nephew, he absolutely loved it! He refused to even throw away the box because he wanted to keep Spider-Man safe. The product came in perfect condition and very quick. Def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: I've received a spider-man different than the displayed on the amazon page photos!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've received a spider-man different than the displayed on the amazon page photos!!! And the arm is broken as you can see in my photos!!! I would return it but I live outside US and shipping it back will cost me 5 times its price.
customer_reviews.author: Hasheesh

customer_reviews.title: Spider-Man
customer_reviews.text: It was missing a piece. The titan power fx pack. Don’t know why this would be separate.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: False advertising. The pictures of the product clearly suggest it comes with an attachment. However, in very tiny text on the packaging it says the attachment is not included. Always read the one star reviews. I guess anyone who doesn't care about being misled or is a bot would give this 5 stars...
customer_reviews.author: Raymond R Holston

product_meta.title: Spider-Man E0649 Titan Hero Series Action Figure, Pack of 1
product_meta.description:
Imagine big web-slinging adventures with this Titan Hero Series Spider-Man figure! This figure measures in at a towering 12-inch scale, so kids can imagine giant-sized battles between their favorite heroes and villains! Figure features ball joint articulation for poseability at shoulders and hips. Collect other Titan Hero Series figures for more battling action! (Each sold separately. Subject to availability.) 

Copyright 2017 Marvel. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: 12-Inch-scale Spider-Man action Figure with ball joint articulation and classic character design
Connect Titan hero power FX pack to activate sounds & phrases (not included; sold separately with Titan hero power FX figures)
Includes Titan hero power FX connection port
Check out other Titan hero series and Titan hero power FX figures (each sold separately)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,524 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
